original_text: Beside their servants and their maids, of whom there were seven thousand three hundred thirty and seven: and there were among them two hundred singing men and singing women.
korean_text: 그 외에 남종과 여종이 칠천삼백삼십칠 명이요 노래하는 남녀가 이백 명이요

sentences.original_text: Beside their servants and their maids,
of whom there were seven thousand three hundred thirty and seven:
and there were among them two hundred singing men
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중에는 이백 명의 남성 가수가 있었고
